name: Eat & Play in Snowy Wonderland
description:
This game is made for submission to the Global Game Jam 2020: Winter Wonderland, which is my first game jam. I had lots of fun making this game!

An explorative single/multi-player game where you can cook delicious turkey, meat and eggs in the kitchen or buy an ice cream from the vending machine or just chill by the serene hideout while admiring the magical oak tree or have coffee with furry friends. You can even swim in the lake or bounce up high onto the tree!

Unravel the secrets and find all the hidden potions to get super powers - which are all conveniently delivered to your fridge with no fuss. There are no enemies to kill and plenty of health packs scattered around to ensure that you are well cared for while still being able to play till your heart's content anywhere you want, any time.

HAPPY NEW YEARS EVE EVERYONE! BYEBYE 2020!
